This product is truly a masterpiece, and we believe it's worth every penny of its $100 price tag. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at the same price. Don't miss out on the chance to experience the excellence firsthand. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can enhance your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
